title: Operation HOME
subtitle: Arcade-style shooter
author: Matthew Maxwell
description: Operation HOME is a game built in Unity for a game jam.

content.data: Operation H.O.M.E. ('Heck Off My Earth') is a simple arcade shooter created for the 2019 Global Game Jam. The theme of the jam was 'home' and what it represents to you. Does home mean a location, sound, smell, or feeling? My team decided that for us it meant defending the Earth from invading aliens.
